content: the coloratura lace top features a delicate shell in a range of colors that is set against a solid accent color this top makes a sophisticated addition to your summer wardrobe the size and colors are easily adjustable the top is worked from the bottom up initially in the round and then in row for the front and back of the chest which are identical rectangles finally the front and back are joined at each shoulder creating a boat neck the top features a four-row lace repeat alternating with two row of solid double_crochet the pattern uses one main color and several different accent colors
